attributes.action: Recognise this VOTE of NO CONFIDENCE and to Call a General Election Immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the loss of private data, including personal information which could put at risk those people affected being the last straw on the camel's back, there is no longer any confidence in the present Government being able to run this Country's affairs competently.

No longer is there confidence in the promise of lessons to be learned, and sweet platitudes and apologies they have become too frequent to hold any credence.

It is time for the Public to choose a new Government and Democracy to prevail.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
